bill_title: rename South Scalp Creek Lakeside Use Area in Gregory County.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to rename South Scalp Creek Lakeside Use Area in Gregory County. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. The state-owned South Scalp Creek Lakeside Use Area in Gregory County is renamed Naca Topa, or Four Chiefs, Lakeside Use Area to honor four great leaders of the Rosebud Sioux Tribe.
